name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dynamic Field Service Engineer with 13+ years of experience in system performance monitoring, troubleshooting (electronics and mechanics), and system analysis, focused on delivering high-quality support for medical imaging equipment. Proficient in preventative maintenance and technical education, ensuring continuous learning and effective communication with stakeholders.

In addition to my field expertise, I possess strong programming skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, complemented by hands-on backend development experience using **Node.js** and **Django**. My background includes deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines to enhance system performance and reliability.

Demonstrated proficiency in complying with industry standards while leveraging AI/ML technologies for predictive analytics and automation. Fluent in English and proficient in Scandinavian languages, I have a valid driver's license class B, amplifying my capability to manage on-site service demands efficiently.

Delivered technical education to medical staff and technicians, enhancing their understanding and efficient use of advanced medical imaging technology.
Demonstrated excellent communication skills by delivering clear technical support and training sessions in both English and Scandinavian languages.
Maintained an ongoing commitment to continuous learning to stay updated with the latest in medical imaging technology and best service practices.
Handled multiple service calls, achieving a 95% customer satisfaction rate through effective service delivery and problem resolution.
Managed service schedules and travel efficiently, holding a valid driver’s license class B to ensure timely maintenance and repairs across various locations.

Conducted system performance monitoring for medical imaging equipment, ensuring optimal functionality and reducing downtime through preventative maintenance strategies.

Utilized strong communication skills to liaise between healthcare professionals and technical teams, addressing issues and providing clear resolutions in both **English** and Scandinavian languages.

Documented all field service activities and equipment performance metrics, contributing to continuous learning initiatives and improving service delivery processes by **30%**.

Conducted preventative maintenance and system performance monitoring on medical imaging equipment, ensuring consistent operational readiness and compliance with healthcare standards.
Performed thorough system analysis to identify and troubleshoot both electronics and mechanics issues, successfully resolving **95%** of service calls on the first visit.
Implemented effective communication strategies to deliver technical education to healthcare staff, enhancing their understanding of system functionalities and maintenance practices.
Maintained a continuous learning approach, keeping updated with the latest advancements in medical imaging technologies to provide informed support and solutions.
Leveraged English and Scandinavian language proficiency to effectively communicate with diverse teams and clients, facilitating clear and concise technical discussions.
Utilized a driver's license class B for travel to client sites, ensuring timely service delivery and customer satisfaction across a vast territory of medical facilities.
Demonstrated strong analytical skills in troubleshooting, consistently reducing downtime and enhancing the performance of medical imaging systems by **30%** through strategic maintenance and system upgrades.
Executed detailed documentation of service activities and customer interactions, contributing to knowledge transfer and improving overall service efficiency.
